item.title: World Space UI
item.description: Using outlines with world space UI. How to make worldspace UI canvas that intersects properly? : r/Unity3D (reddit.com) // TO BE UPDATED.

item.title: Alpha Cutout
item.description: Linework supports alpha cutout shaders for Wide Outline and Soft Outline. Other outline types are not currently supported. How to enable alpha cutout? To enable alpha cutout for an outline, enable the Alpha Cutout toggle and specify the alpha cutout Texture that should be used.

item.title: Change outline visuals at runtime
item.description: Changing outline visuals at runtime is a common use case. For example, you might want to fade an outline in/out or change the width of the outline during the game.

item.title: index
item.description: Thank you for your interest in Linework! You have already downloaded Linework and want to get started? Read the Getting Started section. You can get Linework from the asset store here assetstore.unity.com/packages/slug/294140.

item.title: Enable an outline on mouse hover or click
item.description: Enabling an outline around an object when hovering over it or when clicking it is a common use case. Below you will find some example code that shows how you can implement this.

item.title: Changelog
item.description: All notable changes to this package will be documented in this file. The format is based on Keep a Changelog, and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

item.title: Outline Bleeding
item.description: Issue For the Soft Outline and Wide Outline outline effects, the outlines are rendered by having a silhouette that is dilated in screen-space. Because of the screen-space nature of this effect, the outline will not always completely respect the configured Occlusion State.

item.title: Occlusion States
item.description: The Render setting for outlines and fills usually has 3 options. Render Always Always render the outline/fill, regardless of its occlusion state in the scene.

item.title: Rendering Layer Masks
item.description: All outline and fill effects make use of the Rendering Layer Mask system in Unity to control which objects should receive an outline. Using this system you gain a lot of flexibility to define which objects receive which outlines.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: An overview of the features I‚Äôm currently working on. If you have any feature requests, feel free to reach out through the Discord and add the feature to the feature-requests channel (see Contact).
